projects.name: Book Store App
projects.description: Developed and maintained a book shopping site with features including user authentication, book browsing, shopping cart, and checkout process. Implemented responsive design for an optimal user experience across various devices using React. Designed RESTful API using Node.JS and Express to handle CRUD operations and integrate with the front-end. Utilized MongoDB for managing and querying book data, ensuring efficient data retrieval and storage.

projects.name: Shopping Portal
projects.description: Developed responsive shopping portal using Tailwind CSS and React, ensuring compatibility across multiple devices and browsers. Implemented efficient cart functionality, enabling users to add, remove, and modify items seamlessly and to enhance user experience.

projects.name: RazorPay FrontEnd Clone
projects.description: Successfully cloned the Razorpay website using Tailwind CSS, ensuring fidelity to the original design and functionality. Implemented responsive design principles to guarantee optimal user experience across all devices and screen sizes.

experiences.description: Work as Frontend developer in Blockchain Research Lab. Carried a Technical event under BRL at college. Worldquant brain (Alpha Creation ) experience 1 year experience.
